extendedInfo.description: e-Legion issues a mobile application for Highrise, a popular service for business contacts and tasks management from 37signals. Highrise is built around 3 basic elements: contacts, tasks, deals. Our mobile application is designed to perform operations with deals and allows a user: - to see all the recent activities: deals status changes, last comments - to see detailed information on deals - perform search for specific deals - post new commentsPRO version is advertising free. FREE version includes advertising. Test credentialsServer: testcompany14User name: Stieg LarssonPassword: pinozero

reviews.title: Very limited but does what says.
reviews.comment: Sure wish there was a fully functional app. Can\'t search for contacts even.... and contacts are what highrise is built on. Can add comments only to recent added contacts. No tasks... nothing else!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Connect on T-Mo GS3
reviews.comment: Cannot even log in. Says no connection. I am disappoint.
reviews.author: Adeeb Molla

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: Great start and beats Rooftop for stability and look/feel.  Can we get it fully functional with Highrise though?  There are lots of people who need it, I think.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful!!
reviews.comment: That\'s I was really searching for years! Thank you, guys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice look
reviews.comment: Looks good and I will use it often, however, am I missing functionality? When I hit my menu button while in a note I get a force close everytime. All in all looks like it will be a great app...keep up the good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really is ONLY deals
reviews.comment: You really can only see your deals. No contacts. Pointless for my needs.
reviews.author: Tim Quinton

reviews.title: Need more functionality
reviews.comment: Please add contacts and tasks! I would pay for this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot log in
reviews.comment: I cannot log in either. Yet I am able to log into other sites. It says\" No connection\"
reviews.author: G. Gorman
